pageContent: The present paper gives a comprehensive overview of recent data, especially prospective randomized trials, which support an important role for nutrition in the development of prostate cancer. Prostate cancer seems to be an ideal candidate for chemoprevention, in order to interfere by modification of nutritional habits with its onset, its incidence and ultimately with its progression, especially in high risk groups.

metaData.source:
Prostate cancer: potential targets of anti-proliferative and apoptotic signaling pathways
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15694830/
